member.name: T:SimpleML.IHypothesisCalculator
member.summary: Defines methods to calculate the result of a hypothesis function.

member.name: M:SimpleML.IHypothesisCalculator.Calculate(SimpleML.Matrix,SimpleML.Matrix)
member.summary: Calculates the result of a hypothesis function.
member.param: The data series used in evaluating the hypothesis, stored column-wise in a matrix.
The parameter values of the hypothesis, stored column-wise in a matrix.
member.returns: A matrix containing a single column containing the hypothesis evaluation for each item in the data series (the 'm' dimension of the resulting matrix should match the 'm' dimension of the 'dataSeries' parameter).
